channel.title: Cybersecurity News Aggregator
channel.description: Latest cybersecurity news from top sources
channel.comment: News aggregated from: Krebs on Security, The Hacker News, Threatpost, Bleeping Computer, Dark Reading, ZDNet Security

item.title: ERMAC V3.0 Banking Trojan Source Code Leak Exposes Full Malware Infrastructure
item.description:
Cybersecurity researchers have detailed the inner workings of an Android banking trojan called ERMAC 3.0, uncovering serious shortcomings in the operators' infrastructure.
